source.query:
SELECT *
FROM LRS_RAW.MASTER_DATA.TOWER_TABLE_NAMES
WHERE LOAD_TYPE = 'Full'
AND TABLE_NAME NOT IN ('SITE', 'DESTINATION', 'VEHICLE', 'TRIP', 'WORKER');

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT CUSTOMERPAYMENTACCOUNTUID
     , CUSTID
     , SITEID
     , ISDEFAULTAUTOMATICPAYMENTACCOUNT
     , CREDITCARDTYPE
     , ACCOUNTHOLDERNAME
     , NULL AS CREDITCARDNUMBER
     , NULL AS CREDITCARDSECURITYCODE
     , CREDITCARDEXPIRATIONDATE
     , NULL AS DEBITACCOUNT
     , NULL AS DEBITROUTING
     , PAYMENTACCOUNTADDRESSUID
     , ACCOUNTTYPE
     , ACTIVE
     , NULL AS CREDITCARDDESCRIPTION
     , NULL AS CREDITCARDLAST4
     , NULL AS MERCHANTPROFILEID
     , DEBITACCOUNTTYPE
     , NULL AS ACCOUNTDESCRIPTION
     , AUTOPAYMAXLIMIT
     , AUTOPAYSCOPE
     , NULL AS DEBITACCOUNTLAST4
     , NULL AS DEBITROUTINGLAST4
     , DEBITACCOUNTOWNERSHIP
     , PROCESSINGMETHOD
     , MERCHANTTOKEN
FROM CUSTOMERPAYMENTACCOUNT

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from INVOICE 
where INVOICEuiID >  @{item().INVOICE}

Select * from ARdetail 
where replace(ARDETAILUID, '-', '') > @{item().ARDETAIL}
select * from GLEXPORTBATCH where GLEXPORTBATCHUID > @{item().GLEXPORTBATCH}

select * from payment 
where paymentuid >  @{item().PAYMENT}

select * from INVOICEDETAIL 
where INVOICEDETAILUID > @{item().INVOICEDETAIL}

source.query:
SELECT *

and
table_name IN ('SERVICEINFO', 'DAILYROUTEENTRY', 'DAILYROUTEENTRYVEHICLE','WORKORDERCHARGE', 'DAILYROUTEENTRY', 'DAILYROUTEDOWNTIME','DAILYROUTEENTRYLABOR')

activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

text.value:
@{concat('merge into LRS_RAW.TOWER_RAW.ARDETAIL t 
using 
    TOWER_RAW.ARDETAIL_STAGING s 
on t.ardetailuid = s.ardetailuid  
when matched then update set 
	ardetailuid = s.ardetailuid ,
      t.sourceuid = s.sourceuid ,
      t.status = s.status ,
      t.custid = s.custid ,
      t.siteid = s.siteid ,
      t.material = s.material ,
      t.detailtype = s.detailtype ,
      t.tax = s.tax ,
      t.debitacct = s.debitacct ,
      t.creditacct = s.creditacct ,
      t.period = s.period ,
      t.invoiceuid = s.invoiceuid ,
      t.transactiondate = s.transactiondate ,
      t.duedate = s.duedate ,
      t.glexportbatchuid = s.glexportbatchuid ,
      t.quantity = s.quantity ,
      t.unitrate = s.unitrate,
      t.originalamount = s.originalamount ,
      t.balance = s.balance ,
      t.billedappliedamount = s.billedappliedamount ,
      t.displayoninvoice = s.displayoninvoice ,
      t.detailsource = s.detailsource ,
      t.companyid = s. companyid ,
      t.createddatetime = s.createddatetime ,
      t.creditacctsegtype = s.creditacctsegtype ,
      t.debitacctsegtype = s.debitacctsegtype 
when not matched then insert 
	(
	ardetailuid ,
      t.sourceuid ,
      t.status ,
      t.custid ,
      t.siteid ,
      t.material ,
      t.detailtype ,
      t.tax ,
      t.debitacct ,
      t.creditacct ,
      t.period ,
      t.invoiceuid ,
      t.transactiondate ,
      t.duedate ,
      t.glexportbatchuid ,
      t.quantity ,
      t.unitrate ,
      t.originalamount ,
      t.balance ,
      t.billedappliedamount ,
      t.displayoninvoice ,
      t.detailsource ,
      t.companyid ,
      t.createddatetime ,
      t.creditacctsegtype ,
      t.debitacctsegtype 
	)
values 
	(
	 ardetailuid ,
      s.sourceuid ,
      s.status ,
      s.custid ,
      s.siteid ,
      s.material ,
      s.detailtype ,
      s.tax ,
      s.debitacct ,
      s.creditacct ,
      s.period ,
      s.invoiceuid ,
      s.transactiondate ,
      s.duedate ,
      s.glexportbatchuid ,
      s.quantity ,
      s.unitrate ,
      s.originalamount ,
      s.balance ,
      s.billedappliedamount ,
      s.displayoninvoice ,
      s.detailsource ,
      s.companyid ,
      s.createddatetime ,
      s.creditacctsegtype ,
      s.debitacctsegtype)'
	)}

activities.name: Incremental Loop Over ID Watermark Tables
activities.description: Activity to loop over tables that have primary keys with incremental IDs. This loops looks at our Watermark table in Snowflake and appends any IDs found in SQL server that are greater than the latest watermark in Snowflake.

	t.rm05_fuom = s.rm05_fuom,
	t.rm05_tim1 = s.rm05_tim1,
	t.rm05_tim2 = s.rm05_tim2,
	t.rm05_odm1 = s.rm05_odm1,
	t.rm05_odm2 = s.rm05_odm2,
	t.rm05_ouom = s.rm05_ouom,
	t.rm05_note = s.rm05_note,
	t.rm05_starthour = s.rm05_starthour,
	t.rm05_endhour = s.rm05_endhour,
	t.rm05_oil = s.rm05_oil,
	t.rm05_oil_uom = s.rm05_oil_uom,

when not matched then insert 
	(

activities.name: Loop Over Tables
activities.description: activity to loop over our array of results which are the tables

activities.name: RM05 Incremental Delta Load to Staging
activities.description: Copying delta rows from sql server to the staging tables created for each instance in snowflake (these tables will be dropped after all activities are completed)

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from RM05
where RM05_DATE > DATEADD(day, -7, GETDATE())

activities.name: Snowflake Create Staging Tables
activities.description: create staging table used to store the delta incremental load. In this staging table, we perform a merge to the main raw table.

text.value:
@{concat('Create or replace table ', item().Snowflake_schema,'.',item().table_name,'_staging
    as 
    select * from ', item().Snowflake_schema,'.',item().table_name,
    ' where 1=0')}

activities.name: RM05 Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

dependsOn.activity: RM05 Incremental Delta Load to Staging

text.value:
@{concat('merge into ', item().Snowflake_schema,'.','RM05 t 
using ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,'.','RM05_STAGING s 
on concat(t.rm05_rout, t.rm05_seq1,t.rm05_seq2,t.rm05_date) = concat(s.rm05_rout, s.rm05_seq1,s.rm05_seq2,s.rm05_date) 
when matched then update set 
    t.rm05_date = s.rm05_date,
	t.rm05_rout = s.rm05_rout,
	t.rm05_seq1 = s.rm05_seq1, 
	t.rm05_seq2 = s.rm05_seq2, 
	t.rm05_truk = s.rm05_truk,
	t.rm05_driv = s.rm05_driv,
	t.rm05_help = s.rm05_help,

FROM INFORMATION_SCHEMA.TABLES INS
WHERE TABLE_SCHEMA in ('TRUX_CD_COMP_RAW','TRUX_DC_COMP_RAW','TRUX_ES_COMP_RAW','TRUX_HR_COMP_RAW','TRUX_LR_COMP_RAW','TRUX_MC_COMP_RAW','TRUX_MH_COMP_RAW',

    'TRUX_RZ_COMP_RAW','TRUX_SH_COMP_RAW','TRUX_SW_COMP_RAW','TRUX_TP_COMP_RAW','TRUX_WA_COMP_RAW')
AND TABLENAME IN ('RM05','SM01','DM01','DM01p','DM05A','DM05B','DM05FT','DM05Z','LM02','MT02','RM03U');

SELECT 'LRS_RAW' as DatabaseName, TABLE_NAME as TableName,TABLE_SCHEMA as SchemaName, CREATED as CreatedDate, LAST_ALTERED as LastUpdatedDate

source.sqlReaderQuery:
SELECT [OPACCOUNT_ID]
, [OPACCOUNT_EMAIL]
, [OPACCOUNT_REGISDTE]
, os.[OPACCESS_ID]
, [OPACCESS_COMP]
, [OPACCESS_CUST]
, [OPACCESS_SITE]
, [OPACCESS_ACTIVEDTE]
, [OPACCESS_DEACTIVEDTE]
FROM [OPACCOUNT] ot
INNER JOIN [OPACCESS] os
ON [OPACCOUNT_ID] = [OPACCESS_LINK]
INNER JOIN (SELECT MAX([OPACCESS_ID]) AS [OPACCESS_ID]
		      FROM [OPACCESS]
			 GROUP BY OPACCESS_LINK) AS latest
ON os.[OPACCESS_ID] = latest.[OPACCESS_ID];

text.value:
@{concat('merge into ', item().Snowflake_schema,'.','RM05 t 
using ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,'.','RM05_STAGING s 
on concat(t.rm05_rout, t.rm05_seq1,t.rm05_seq2,t.rm05_date) = concat(s.rm05_rout, s.rm05_seq1,s.rm05_seq2,s.rm05_date) 
when matched then update set 
    t.rm05_date = s.rm05_date,
	t.rm05_rout = s.rm05_rout,
	t.rm05_seq1 = s.rm05_seq1, 
	t.rm05_seq2 = s.rm05_seq2, 
	t.rm05_truk = s.rm05_truk,
	t.rm05_driv = s.rm05_driv,
	t.rm05_help = s.rm05_help,
	t.rm05_fuel = s.rm05_fuel,
	t.rm05_fuom = s.rm05_fuom,
	t.rm05_tim1 = s.rm05_tim1,
	t.rm05_tim2 = s.rm05_tim2,
	t.rm05_odm1 = s.rm05_odm1,
	t.rm05_odm2 = s.rm05_odm2,
	t.rm05_ouom = s.rm05_ouom,
	t.rm05_note = s.rm05_note,
	t.rm05_starthour = s.rm05_starthour,
	t.rm05_endhour = s.rm05_endhour,
	t.rm05_oil = s.rm05_oil,
	t.rm05_oil_uom = s.rm05_oil_uom,
	t.rm05_deptime = s.rm05_deptime,
	t.rm05_rettime = s.rm05_rettime,
	t.rm05_starttime= s.rm05_starttime 
when not matched then insert 
	(
	t.rm05_date,
	t.rm05_rout,
	t.rm05_seq1,
	t.rm05_seq2,
	t.rm05_truk,
	t.rm05_driv,
	t.rm05_help,
	t.rm05_fuel,
	t.rm05_fuom,
	t.rm05_tim1,
	t.rm05_tim2,
	t.rm05_odm1,
	t.rm05_odm2,
	t.rm05_ouom,
	t.rm05_note,
	t.rm05_starthour,
	t.rm05_endhour,
	t.rm05_oil,
	t.rm05_oil_uom,
	t.rm05_deptime,
	t.rm05_rettime,
	t.rm05_starttime 
	)
values 
	(
	s.rm05_date,
	s.rm05_rout,
	s.rm05_seq1, 
	s.rm05_seq2, 
	s.rm05_truk,
	s.rm05_driv,
	s.rm05_help,
	s.rm05_fuel,
	s.rm05_fuom,
	s.rm05_tim1,
	s.rm05_tim2,
	s.rm05_odm1,
	s.rm05_odm2,
	s.rm05_ouom,
	s.rm05_note,
	s.rm05_starthour,
	s.rm05_endhour,
	s.rm05_oil,
	s.rm05_oil_uom,
	s.rm05_deptime,
	s.rm05_rettime,
	s.rm05_starttime)'
	)}

sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from RM05
where RM05_DATE > DATEADD(day, -7, GETDATE())

activities.name: Snowflake Create Staging Tables
activities.description: create staging table used to store the delta incremental load. In this staging table, we perform a merge to the main raw table.

text.value:
@{concat('Create or replace table ', item().Snowflake_schema,'.',item().table_name,'_staging
    as 
    select * from ', item().Snowflake_schema,'.',item().table_name,
    ' where 1=0')}

activities.name: RM05 Snowflake Merge Operation
activities.description: merge statement to the raw tables. this helps avoids any duplication and upsert the rows needed.

dependsOn.activity: RM05 Incremental Delta Load to Staging

text.value:
@{concat('merge into ', item().Snowflake_schema,'.','RM05 t 
using ', 
    item().Snowflake_schema,'.','RM05_STAGING s 
on concat(t.rm05_rout, t.rm05_seq1,t.rm05_seq2,t.rm05_date) = concat(s.rm05_rout, s.rm05_seq1,s.rm05_seq2,s.rm05_date) 
when matched then update set 
    t.rm05_date = s.rm05_date,
	t.rm05_rout = s.rm05_rout,
	t.rm05_seq1 = s.rm05_seq1, 
	t.rm05_seq2 = s.rm05_seq2, 
	t.rm05_truk = s.rm05_truk,
	t.rm05_driv = s.rm05_driv,
	t.rm05_help = s.rm05_help,
	t.rm05_fuel = s.rm05_fuel,
	t.rm05_fuom = s.rm05_fuom,
	t.rm05_tim1 = s.rm05_tim1,
	t.rm05_tim2 = s.rm05_tim2,
	t.rm05_odm1 = s.rm05_odm1,
	t.rm05_odm2 = s.rm05_odm2,
	t.rm05_ouom = s.rm05_ouom,
	t.rm05_note = s.rm05_note,
	t.rm05_starthour = s.rm05_starthour,
	t.rm05_endhour = s.rm05_endhour,
	t.rm05_oil = s.rm05_oil,
	t.rm05_oil_uom = s.rm05_oil_uom,
	t.rm05_deptime = s.rm05_deptime,
	t.rm05_rettime = s.rm05_rettime,
	t.rm05_starttime= s.rm05_starttime 
when not matched then insert 
	(
	t.rm05_date,
	t.rm05_rout,
	t.rm05_seq1,
	t.rm05_seq2,
	t.rm05_truk,
	t.rm05_driv,
	t.rm05_help,
	t.rm05_fuel,
	t.rm05_fuom,
	t.rm05_tim1,
	t.rm05_tim2,
	t.rm05_odm1,
	t.rm05_odm2,
	t.rm05_ouom,
	t.rm05_note,
	t.rm05_starthour,
	t.rm05_endhour,
	t.rm05_oil,
	t.rm05_oil_uom,
	t.rm05_deptime,
	t.rm05_rettime,
	t.rm05_starttime 
	)
values 
	(
	s.rm05_date,
	s.rm05_rout,
	s.rm05_seq1, 
	s.rm05_seq2, 
	s.rm05_truk,
	s.rm05_driv,
	s.rm05_help,
	s.rm05_fuel,
	s.rm05_fuom,
	s.rm05_tim1,
	s.rm05_tim2,
	s.rm05_odm1,
	s.rm05_odm2,
	s.rm05_ouom,
	s.rm05_note,
	s.rm05_starthour,
	s.rm05_endhour,
	s.rm05_oil,
	s.rm05_oil_uom,
	s.rm05_deptime,
	s.rm05_rettime,
	s.rm05_starttime)'
	)}
